name: Feedback Factory
description:
So, you make buildings to make resources so you can make more buildings. Ultimately, you must make the Astonishing Star.

Made the art in Aseprite (its not exactly pixel art, so probably not the best tool to use for it), sound effects in Bfxr, and the music in Online Music Sequencer (I don't use that anymore, just that the music I used was from ages ago), and in Lmms. Also, as you can tell from the logo flashing at the start, I made it in Unity.

Feel free to give feedback :)
